page.title: 13Tourists in Longnor
page.content: Longnor has a lot of tourists and hikers. Many of the tourists stay in holiday cottages. Some tourist attractions are the Microplant factory and Paul Eden's clock factory. There is a small cafe called The Parrots which quite a few people visit. You can also go to the Cheshire Cheese or the Crewe and Harpur Arms for a meal. You can also stay in the hotel at the Crewe and Harpur Arms or at the cottages next door. People usually come to Longnor to walk in the beautiful surrounding countryside, to fish or just for the peace and quiet away from the busy towns. There are at least four places where you can stay. People came from as far away as Australia, Switzerland and Germany. The rest come from England, Scotland and Wales.
